data.name: richTextBox13.Text
data.value: A window will appear asking to scan a card. Once a card is scanned a new window will appear asking the user to input information about the customer's information. The customer's plate number will be asked for verification in case the RFID card is lost with an optional name.

data.name: richTextBox14.Text
data.value:
To activate cards to be used in the rack click on the "Activate Card" button below the main window.
Note: Activation is different from adding RFID cards. Adding RFID cards defaults to deactivated status. For proper activation the "Activate Card" button should be used.

data.name: richTextBox10.Text
data.value:
A window will appear asking to scan a card. Once a card is scanned a new window will appear showing various information.
The user will be asked to input the payment amount. Once confirmed a window will appear with a computation of the change.

data.name: richTextBox8.Text
data.value:
Click "Payment Settings" to open the payments settings window. In this window the user will be able to change the rate on which the customer will be charged and how much will they be charged.
An option to add a base rate can be enabled as well to charge the customer on the first insert of the card. Another option is the parking fee which is a one time fee.
Note: The customer will be charged based on the consumed duration not the duration start. This will be balanced by the base rate on the user's preference.

data.name: richTextBox5.Text
data.value:
In this window all RFIDs can be managed with the exception of the MasterCard. Cards can be locked, deactivated, or activated. A card will lock if it is used 3 times on the wrong rack. By clicking on the "+" button a window will appear asking the user to scan a card followed by a confirmation to add the card.
Note: Once a card is added, the Card number will not change even if the card is deleted. This is for record keeping and safety purposes. If a card is deleted it will not longer be usable, if the same card is added again it will retain its card number and can be used again.

data.name: richTextBox3.Text
data.value:
Click "Manage Racks" and a window should appear. Then click the "+" button for a window to appear that will ask for the rack's slot number.
Note: Each rack will have a unique rack number that is bound to rack itself.

data.name: richTextBox1.Text
data.value: Welcome to the Helmet Harbour Application! This guide will help you set up the app and walk you through the basic steps to begin using the system. Whether you are logging in for the first time or just learning the features, this section will show you everything you need to know to start.

data.name: richTextBox39.Text
data.value:
Clicking on the "Actions Log" button will open the actions log window.
In this window all actions done in the application will be recorded. This includes payment processing, account managing, and rack management.

data.name: richTextBox47.Text
data.value:
Clicking on the "Transactions Log" button will open the transactions record window.
In this window all previous transactions done in the application will be recorded for analytical and security purposes.
